abstract: The Birth of Baby X, exhibit during which performance artist Marni Kotak gave birth before an audience of 15, has drawn attention to Microscope Gallery in Bushwick, Brooklyn; gallery has won a reputation for taking chances on emerging artists and keeping ties to older pioneers.
snippet: An exhibit around a live birth has drawn news cameras to a Brooklyn gallery that has quickly won a reputation for taking chances on emerging artists and keeping ties to older pioneers.
lead_paragraph: An exhibit around a live birth has drawn news cameras to a Brooklyn gallery that has quickly won a reputation for taking chances on emerging artists and keeping ties to older pioneers.

headline.main: For a Gallery at the Edge, Fame Is Born Tuesday
headline.print_headline: For a Gallery at the Edge, Fame Is Born Tuesday
headline.seo: Birth Brings Attention to Microscope Gallery
